name: Sheep! (Corbak Games, Gahnos, Astoeth)
description:
Made in 3 hours for Trijam#150

In Sheep! you need to run after sheeps and guide them into their enclosure.
Don't lose them though.

Controls:

- Mouse or WASD

Hope you'll enjoy!

credits:

music - Wyver9 ; sound effects- Brandon Morris(dog barking); Anton Deluge (sheep)
